name: zumper
prompt_template:
Scrape ALL apartment building listings visible on this page. Extract exactly {max_results} properties. For EACH building shown, get:
- building_name: the apartment building or property name (like Forest Ridge Apartments, The Lennox, etc.)
- rent_range: the monthly rent shown (include full ranges like $1,739-$2,599)
- property_address: complete street address with city and postal code
- bedroom_range: bedroom options shown (include ranges like 1-3 beds or Studio-2 beds)
- property_features: ALL amenities listed (in-unit laundry, parking, gym, pool, sqft, bathrooms, etc.)
- building_url: the complete clickable URL to this building listing

Extract ALL {max_results} building listings visible on the page with complete details.
